entry.title:
[WW] Where can I buy modafinil in Europe?
I'm from south america and I've been takin
entry.content:
Where can I buy modafinil in Europe?
I'm from south america and I've been taking Concerta as part of a treatment from my doctor because of ADHD (with so far good results).
Now I'm traveling in Europe for already two months and run out of medication a month ago. I know methylphenidate is more difficult to get and to avoid getting tested again by a doctor (I'm not staying that much time in a given country) I'm willing to try Modafinil as some say it has positive results. Any ideas?
[I didn't check if this question is against the rules, hope it isn't]
